hero.title: Master Frontend Development
hero.description: Join our comprehensive 8-month frontend development program. Learn HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React from industry experts. Build real-world projects and launch your tech career.

features.title: Why Choose Our Program?
features.subtitle: We provide everything you need to become a successful frontend developer, from comprehensive curriculum to career support.

curriculum.title: Industry-Ready Curriculum
curriculum.description: Learn the latest technologies used by top companies: HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript ES6+, React, and modern development tools.

mentorship.title: Expert Mentorship
mentorship.description: Get guidance from experienced developers working at leading tech companies. Receive personalized feedback and career advice.

projects.title: Hands-On Projects
projects.description: Build real-world applications that you can showcase in your portfolio. Work on group projects that simulate actual development teams.

workflow.title: Professional Workflow
workflow.description: Master Git, GitHub, code reviews, and agile development practices used in professional software development environments.

schedule.title: Flexible Schedule
schedule.description: 6 hours per week with evening classes designed for working professionals. Study at your own pace with recorded sessions.

support.title: Career Support
support.description: Resume review, interview preparation, LinkedIn optimization, and job placement assistance to launch your tech career.

classes.title: Live Interactive Classes
classes.description: Engage with instructors and peers in real-time

resources.title: Comprehensive Resources
resources.description: Access to course materials, documentation, and tools

learning.title: Fast-Track Learning
learning.description: Accelerated curriculum designed for quick skill acquisition

curriculum.title: Complete Curriculum
curriculum.subtitle: From HTML basics to advanced React applications. 8 months of comprehensive frontend development training with real-world projects.

cta.title: Ready to Start Your Journey?
cta.description: Join hundreds of students who have transformed their careers through our program.

enrollment.title: Join the Next Cohort
enrollment.subtitle: Transform your career in just 8 months. Limited spots available for our next cohort starting January 15, 2025.

full.name: Full Payment
full.description: One-time payment for the complete program

form.title: Reserve Your Spot
form.subtitle: Fill out the form below to secure your place in the next cohort. We'll contact you within 24 hours to complete your enrollment.

experienceOptions.advanced: Experienced but want to level up

form.goalsPlaceholder: Tell us about your career goals and what you hope to achieve...
form.note: By submitting this form, you agree to our terms and conditions. No payment required to reserve your spot.

success.title: Application Submitted!
success.message: We'll contact you within 24 hours to discuss your enrollment.

footer.description: Empowering the next generation of frontend developers through comprehensive education, mentorship, and hands-on experience. Join thousands of students who have transformed their careers.
